title: Single Disc Scrubber DH-2P
description:
The Dynaclean DH-2P is a powerful single-disc scrubber engineered for heavy commercial use and demanding floor maintenance tasks. Built for facilities requiring aggressive scrubbing performance, the DH-2P combines a robust 2 HP motor with a triple-disc configuration (3 × 300 mm) to deliver exceptional soil removal on concrete, tiles, stone, and industrial flooring.

Equipped with a 10 L water tank and a high brush pressure of 90 kg, the DH-2P ensures deep cleaning, fast dirt breakup, and effective removal of grease, grime, and surface buildup. Its heavy-duty 105 kg construction provides consistent floor contact for maximum scrubbing efficiency.

Designed to operate from a standard 240 V supply and fitted with a 15 m industrial-grade cable, the DH-2P allows wide-area coverage with fewer interruptions. Reliable, durable, and performance-driven, it is ideal for commercial complexes, industrial units, malls, workshops, hospitals, hotels, and large facility maintenance applications.
keyFeatures: Heavy-Duty 2 HP Motor provides strong torque for deep and aggressive scrubbing
Triple Disc System (3 × 300 mm) ensures wide coverage and superior dirt removal
High Brush Pressure of 90 kg delivers exceptional deep-cleaning performance
Large 10 L Water Tank enables uninterrupted cleaning for extended durations
Industrial-Grade Build (105 kg) ensures stability, durability, and long service life
15 m Heavy-Duty Cable offers excellent reach for large cleaning areas
Suitable for demanding commercial and industrial cleaning applications
Ideal for malls, workshops, factories, hotels, hospitals, and high-traffic floor care
Consistent and uniform floor contact ensures fast removal of grime and hardened dirt
Engineered for reliability, reduced operator fatigue, and long-term daily use
